heading: Upon application
text:
The commissioner shall also have authority to modify the requirements of any precept upon
     application to such commissioner in writing by the owner of the unsafe building, structure, or premises, or such ownerâ€™s
     authorized representative. In addition, upon application to modify the requirements of any precept to seal, shore or demolish the
     structure by the commissioner of housing preservation and development, citywide administrative services or such other
     authorized agency, the commissioner or designee shall have authority to modify such precept accordingly when the com-
     missioner shall be satisfied that such change will secure the safety of such structure or premises equally well.
